RT @plus_socialgood: IN 5 MINUTES - Tune in to @DevexImpact to learn how #socent is changing #globaldev. Join with #DXIchat!
A1. #Socents break down silos‚Äîwhere some see the negatives in developing areas  #EGFellows see #opportunity. #DXIchat http://t.co/UtAiBVDGzv
A1: #socents see the poor as customers  embracing #dignitynotdependence #DXIChat
A1: A mix of capital sources incl. philanthropy & #patientcapital  can move #socents from bold ideas to scalable solutions #DXIChat
A2: Our 2012 report w/ @MonitorDeloitte  maps the evolution of #socents & their funding needs in each stage http://t.co/4eQ8cBOULA #DXIChat
A2: If #socent have more evidence of impact  transparency of how drive change and what they have done  they will get more funding. #DXIChat
A2: We need more funders & partners w/ the risk tolerance & patience to invest in #socents tackling the world‚Äôs biggest challenges #DXIchat
A2. Forge partnerships w/ investors & orgs  explore #ImpInv  seek grants & fellowships #DXIchat http://t.co/TzFqllT0xg
A2: Perhaps funders should be more transparent about specifically what they are looking for; a entrepreneur in Kenya might not know #DXIChat
A2. We need more early stage investment. #Invest in the individual #leader and not just the business model. #DXIchat http://t.co/VWrTd2xSsD
A3: They can spread the word in the countries where they work that they are open to partnering with locals. #DXIChat
A3: Dev actors need to listen to #socents  understand their challenges & see where their strengths may meet #socents needs
A3: For 3 yrs Acumen‚Äôs TA Summit has helped corporations  impact investors & #socents come together to collaborate. #DXIChat
A4 Incubators accelerators should align the support+solutions they are providing to the questions that investors need to see fixed  #DXIChat
A4 If incubator is helping w marketing but a funder cares about financial management of the org they are working on wrong problem #DXIChat
A4. #Incubators & #accelerators useful for start-up #socents to jumpstart initiatives  get #mentoring  #networking  #investing opps #DXIchat
A4. Incubators & accelerators are useful  but at early stage  #socents need support for core building blocks #DXIchat http://t.co/18MsUkH49U
A5. #socents learning from #socents is powerful. Networks like ours connect like-minded innovators to share effective strategies. #DXIchat
A5: (2/3) In June  we saw the success of 9 Acumen CEOs coming together w/ @SAP for a Fellowship to share lessons as they scale #DXIChat
A5: (3/3) Check out this video on the @SAP Fellowship http://t.co/AOrhsasqwn  #DXIChat
A6:  Our evaluation director just gave advice about impact measurement in this blog http://t.co/BPxZvh2aqb. We will share some now #DXIChat
A6: Measures should be influenced by what you can do with info. If you aren't using it  perhaps that‚Äôs not best use of time +money. #DXIChat
A6: PS: @FastCompany named us one of the top 10 most #innovative non-profits & talked about #LeanData http://t.co/FbQPE72j84 #DXIChat
A6: Don't just focus #measurement on a report which comes out 1x/yr. Have a lot behind the scenes leading up to that report. #DXIChat
A6: Acumen's #LeanData focuses on figuring out the ‚Äòhow‚Äô of data collection for #socents
A7. #socents pioneer innovations that benefit the community-the structure they choose is the one that gets greatest impact #DXIchat
